divs: Sighting DetailsI was up getting water ,I looked out my window and I saw a large white gloving object it was traveling NE down Chamblee Tucker Road. It was roof top level. It seemed solid and white liminius glow. It was traveling at about 45 mils an hour or slower. kept same path until I lost it. It did keep me up for a while. My husband said that he had heard noises go over the house, No planes or helecopters.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around December 28th 2008
Summary: looked out back window,saw a white large object,move to my right followed it it was roof level. traveling down Chamblee Tucker rd.
